content: little axel flower baby blanket dk yarn 4 50mm hook 5 00mm hook used only to work the starting 112ch using 5 00mm hook make 114 chain switch to 4 50mm hook and work 1 treble_crochet into the 4th chain from hook and into each chain thereafter to the end 111 treble_crochet 1 2ch counts as a treble_crochet here and throughout 1 treble_crochet into each of next 6 treble_crochet * 3ch skip 1 treble_crochet 1 treble_crochet into each of next 15 treble_crochet* repeat from * to* 5 more times 3ch skip 1 treble_crochet 1 treble_crochet into each of 7 remaining treble_crochet 2 2 chain 1 treble_crochet into each of next 4 treble_crochet *3ch skip 2 treble_crochet 1 double_crochet into 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet 1 treble_crochet into each of next 11 treble_crochet repeat from * to * 5 more times 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet 1 double_crochet into next 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet treble_crochet into each of 5 remaining treble_crochet 3 2ch 1 treble_crochet into each of next 2 treble_crochet * 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in 1st 3ch space 3ch double_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet treble_crochet in each of next 7 treble_crochet * repeat from * to * 5 more times 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in 3ch space 3ch double_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet treble_crochet in each of remaining 3 treble_crochet 4 2ch 1 treble_crochet into each of next 2 treble_crochet * 2 treble_crochet in 3ch space 3ch 1 double_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch 2 treble_crochet in next 3ch space treble_crochet in each of next 7tr * repeat from * to * 5 more times 2 treble_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch 1 double_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch 2tr in next 3ch space 1 treble_crochet in each of remaining 3 treble_crochet 5 2ch 1 treble_crochet in each of next 4 treble_crochet * 2 treble_crochet into 3ch space 2ch 2 treble_crochet in next 3ch space 1 treble_crochet into each of next 11 treble_crochet * repeat from * to * 5 more times 2 treble_crochet in next 3ch space 2ch 2 treble_crochet in next 3ch space 1 treble_crochet in each of remaining 5 treble_crochet row 6 completes the first line of flowers and begins the next 6 2ch treble_crochet into each of next 6 treble_crochet 1 treble_crochet in 2ch space * 1 treble_crochet into each of next 7 treble_crochet 3ch skip 1 treble_crochet 1 treble_crochet in each of next 7 treble_crochet 1 treble_crochet into 2ch space * repeat from * to * 5 more times treble_crochet into each of 7 remaining treble_crochet 7 2ch 1 treble_crochet in each of next 12 treble_crochet * 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet treble_crochet in each of next 11 treble_crochet * repeat from * to * 4 more times 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet treble_crochet in remaining 13 treble_crochet 8 2 chain treble_crochet in each of next 10 treble_crochet
